title: Endimion, the man in the moone Playd before the Queenes Maiestie at Greenewich on Candlemas day at night, by the Chyldren of Paules.
author: Lyly, John, 1554?-1606.
publisher: Printed by I. Charlewood, for the widdowe Broome,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
